<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/resources/{id}/phone_routes"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Assign a Resource as Call/Message handler on a Phone Number

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"id","in":"path","required":true,"description":"The ID of the Resource","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","example":"993ed018-9e79-4e50-b97b-984bd5534095"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"phone_route_id":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","example":"993ed018-9e79-4e50-b97b-984bd5534095"},"handler":{"type":"string","example":"calling","enum":["calling","messaging"]}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"A newly created address for the phone number","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"name":{"type":"string","example":"reception"},"display_name":{"type":"string","example":"Reception"},"resource_id":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","example":"993ed018-9e79-4e50-b97b-984bd5534095"},"type":{"type":"string","example":"room"},"cover_url":{"type":"string","format":"uri","example":"https://example.com/cover.jpg"},"preview_url":{"type":"string","format":"uri","example":"https://example.com/preview.jpg"},"channels":{"type":"object","properties":{"video":{"type":"string","format":"uri","example":"/public/reception?channel=video"},"audio":{"type":"string","format":"uri","example":"/public/reception?channel=audio"},"messaging":{"type":"string","format":"uri","example":"/public/reception?channel=messaging"}}}}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
